personal_projects.name: μsick Bot
personal_projects.description: A Discord music bot coded in Python using Discord API
features: Play music from youtube
A queuing system
Other fun commands

personal_projects.name: GTA Cayo ATM
personal_projects.description: An application that exploits a bug found in GTA
features: Cuts off GTA's access to the internet with a click of a button
Does not interfere with other application's acccess to the internet

personal_projects.name: Ascyee
personal_projects.description: Using Ascii characters to represent an image
features: Convert an image to an Ascii art
I was bored.....

cse_project.name: CSE Chaos
cse_project.description: A CSESoc hiring and offers platform
features: Users could create and join campaigns
Admins could read applications and contact applicants
Intuitive and easy to use UI

cse_project.name: CSE Waves
cse_project.description: A platform to make origanizing meeting easier
features: Users could organize meeting and see the overlapping free time
Follow other users and send them notifications
Profile customization

cse_project.name: OnlyGuests
cse_project.description: A traveller pairing system made for CSE Hackathon 2023
features: Users could organize a travelling session to anywhere
Users could join an existing travelling session
Really nice looking front-end I guess

university_project.name: GigConnect
university_project.description: A B2C platform where companies could provide work for freelancers
features: User could register as either Professional or Company User
Professional user could apply for freelance jobs that they are interested
Company user could post jobs for freelancers to work on
Administration features such as changing project status managing application and project team members
stack: Frontend: ReactJS, TailwindCSS, TypeScript, Framer Motion

university_project.name: Big brain
features: A kahoot-like platform
Users could create and join games
Includes mobile support

university_project.name: Lurk For Work
university_project.description: A social media where people could post jobs
features: A social media-esque application
Users could make post, follow others, like and comment
Includes mobile support

university_project.name: Dungeon Mania
university_project.description: A Backend for a web game called Dungeon Mania
features: An interactive game
Different types of enemies, bosses
Users could customize the character models

university_project.name: UNSW Seams
university_project.description: A backend for a chat webapp, basically a Discord spinoff
features: An online chatting platform
Group chats & DMs
Profile customisations & Metrics tracker
